ygData.subject: Re: Characters
ygData.msgSnippet: It might be good if everyone that hasn t submitted all of their character profiles makes sure that they have SOMETHING up there for people to use as reference.

It might be good if everyone that hasn't submitted all of their 
character profiles makes sure that they have SOMETHING up there 
for people to use as reference.

I suggest that if you don't have enough time to write the complete 
profile, then at least create a profile with your chars name, sex, 
faction, modes, a brief paragraph on what your bot looks like, a 
weapons array, and finally (optional) a short overview of your 
character's personality.

I'll include a short example with a fake bot (it will be obvious):

                           BOB

Name: Bob
Sex: Male
Faction: Bob's Team
Alternate Mode(s): Circus Clown

Description:

Bob, in robot mode, has a red torso, blue legs, white pelvis, and 
arms, and a red head. His eyes are blue, and he wears a small 
mask over his mouth. Most of the time he hunches over, and honks 
a little red horn at people. He has a small yellow flower about two 
inches squared on the left side of his chest.

Bob has several weapons. He has a automatic pie launcher, 
capable of making an interesting slat in the face of any 
unsuspecting person. His small chest flower squirts acid up to 5 
meters. Bob frequently uses his fists to do mock battle with other 
clowns.

Bob is a very outgoing bot. He likes to bug and tease other bots 
that he knows, and doesn't know. This trait has often gotten him 
into trouble, and once it got him beat up. He was in the CR for 
three days.

The above was an example, and a quick one at that. =P
That or less (without the personality section) would do nicely on 
the page. PLEASE make your short character bio's as soon as 
possible.


On 19 May 2001, at 22:12, Soulstice Omega wrote:

> OOC: Okay, I think I can go over and submit some stuff, but I won't be
> able to get the bios done anytime soon, sadly...
